includedAssets.title: Insidious
includedAssets.synopsis: Couple Rose Byrne and Patrick Wilson discover that their new home is haunted. Unnerving horror from the makers of Saw.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Couple Rose Byrne and Patrick Wilson discover that their new home is haunted. Unnerving horror from the makers of Saw.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Couple Rose Byrne and Patrick Wilson discover that their new home is haunted. Unnerving horror from the makers of Saw.

includedAssets.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The supernaturally plagued Lambert family again find themselves the targets of a vicious spectral force despite moving out of their haunted family home. Director James Wan's worthy sequel cleverly locks into the first instalment to provide a satisfying frisson of pure fear. Lambert junior (Ty Simpkins) is revisited by visions of the fiendish Mother Crane but the real danger could be closer to home: is dad (Patrick Wilson) possessed by an evil spirit after his return from "The Further"?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Lambert family face more torment as it emerges that they still have a connection with the spirit world. Rose Byrne and Patrick Wilson star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The supernaturally plagued Lambert family again find themselves the targets of a vicious spectral force despite moving out of their haunted family home. Director James Wan's worthy sequel cleverly locks into the first instalment to provide a satisfying frisson of pure fear. Lambert junior (Ty Simpkins) is revisited by visions of the fiendish Mother Crane but the real danger could be closer to home: is dad (Patrick Wilson) possessed by an evil spirit after his return from "The Further"?

includedAssets.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
includedAssets.synopsis: A wily old medium is called in when a grieving teenager is targeted by a sinister supernatural force. Well-crafted horror prequel from the makers of Saw.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A bedridden teenager is targeted by a sinister supernatural force in this well-crafted horror prequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A wily old medium is called in when a grieving teenager is targeted by a sinister supernatural force. Well-crafted horror prequel from the makers of Saw.

includedAssets.title: Insidious Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: In the first two instalments of the hit horror franchise, the Lambert family find themselves stalked by a paranormal force after they move into a new home, before a prequel reveals more about the past of parapsychologist Elise Rainier. Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Dermot Mulroney star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Lambert family discover their new home is haunted by a paranormal force, while a parapsychologist uses her abilities to help a teenage girl.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the first two instalments of the hit horror franchise, the Lambert family find themselves stalked by a paranormal force after they move into a new home, before a prequel reveals more about the past of parapsychologist Elise Rainier. Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Dermot Mulroney star.
